 137:     "A parameter for optimizing calculations of adaptive moments by\n"


 138:     "cutting off profiles. This parameter is used to decide how many\n"


 139:     "sigma^2 into the Gaussian adaptive moment to extend the moment\n"


 140:     "calculation, with the weight being defined as 0 beyond this point.\n"


 141:     "i.e., if max_moment_nsig2 is set to 25, then the Gaussian is\n"


 142:     "extended to (r^2/sigma^2)=25, with proper accounting for elliptical\n"


 143:     "geometry.  If this parameter is set to some very large number, then\n"


 144:     "the weight is never set to zero and the exponential function is\n"


 145:     "always called. Note: GalSim script devel/modules/test_mom_timing.py\n"


 146:     "was used to choose a value of 25 as being optimal, in that for the\n"


 147:     "cases that were tested, the speedups were typically factors of\n"


 148:     "several, but the results of moments and shear estimation were\n"


 149:     "changed by <10^-5.  Not all possible cases were checked, and so for\n"


 150:     "use of this code for unusual cases, we recommend that users check\n"


 151:     "that this value does not affect accuracy, and/or set it to some\n"


 152:     "large value to completely disable this optimization.\n"


 153:     max_moment_nsig2 = 25
